gameframework.motion

Class MoveStrategyKeyboard8Dir

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
      • gameframework.motion.MoveStrategyConfigurableKeyboard
        • gameframework.motion.MoveStrategyKeyboard
          • gameframework.motion.MoveStrategyKeyboard8Dir
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoveStrategy, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MoveStrategyKeyboard8Dir
extends MoveStrategyKeyboard
    MoveStrategy which listens to the keyboard and answers new speed vectors based on what the user typed. It is possible to move to 8 directions. It is not possible to continue moving when the keys are released
    Author:
    Arnaud Cojez
